Summary: Bright light that dimmed or disappeared as it gained altitude.
divs: sighting detailson sunday 05\24\09 at approximately 11:20 pm i observed a bright white light traveling almost directly overhead of my location. at first i believed the object to be the international space station. i had stated to the others in my party what i thought the object was. just as i had just stated this the object disappeared. i believed it gained altitude at an extreme rate and vanished. one of the other witnesses stated it was probably a shooting star. the other stated it looked as if it just burned out or dimmed. although we could not agree what happened to the object we all agreed that it was indeed unusual. i have seen the iss pass over at least three times in the past two years as our local weatherman advises when it can be seen. i just wish i could have taken a pic or video.
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Tonawanda
There were no other sightings in Tonawanda on or around May 24th 2009
